```{r message = FALSE}
## ----message = FALSE----------------------------------------------------------
set.seed(12345)
library(dplyr)
library(skimr)
library(lubridate)
library(ggpubr)
```

```{r}
# dat = read.csv("countyTable_timeSeries_v3.csv")
load("../covid19.RData")
skim(dat)
dat$date = mdy(dat$date)
dat$FIPS = as.factor(dat$FIPS)
```

## Test data

```{r}
states = unique(dat$state)
for (i in states) {
  print(i)
  
  p1 = dat %>% 
    filter(dat$state == i) %>%
    ggline(x = "date", y = "cTest", col = "FIPS",
           main = paste("COVID tests (raw)", i),
           legend = "none")
  print(p1)
```

## Cases

Raw case load
```{r}
states = unique(dat$state)
for (i in states) {
  print(i)
  
  p1 = dat %>% 
    filter(dat$state == i) %>%
    ggline(x = "date", y = "caseNew", col = "FIPS",
           main = paste("COVID cases", i),
           legend = "none")
  print(p1)
}
```
}

7-day smoothed case load
```{r}
states = unique(dat$state)
for (i in states) {
  print(i)
  
  p1 = dat %>% 
    filter(dat$state == i) %>%
    ggline(x = "date", y = "pcaseNew_lag", col = "FIPS",
           main = paste("COVID cases", i),
           legend = "none")
  print(p1)
}
```
}
